title: Shipper 360
description: Shipper360 provides a range of services for merchants, including shipping, fulfillment, warehousing, omnichannel solutions, and a wallet for payment management.

title: Shipper Dashboard
description: Shipper Dashboard facilitates domestic and international shipping for merchants, alongside a wallet for order payments and commission disbursements.

title: Shipper HQ
description: ShipperHQ aids agents in processing domestic and international orders for merchants and non-merchants. It includes a wallet for order payments and commission disbursement.

title: AvidX - Profile
description: AvidX is an immersive English practice for all levels. Passionately crafted to enhance language skills through engaging methods.
contribution: In this project, my role as a frontend developer involved creating an intuitive and visually appealing user interface. I implemented features that enhanced user engagement, such as the personalized learning paths and interactive exercises. Additionally, I collaborated with the backend team to ensure seamless integration of frontend components.

title: AvidX - Practice
description: AvidX Practice elevates English skills through focused reading, writing, listening, and speaking sessions. Enjoy free access to these beneficial sessions.
contribution: As a contributor to AvidX Practice, my role involved implementing interactive exercises, developing the speaking challenges feature, and ensuring a visually appealing and user-friendly interface. The goal was to create an online space where users could genuinely enjoy practicing English and witness tangible progress in their language skills.

title: Vita School
description: Vita School's dynamic web profile highlights the institution's essence, serving students, parents, and the community with cultural insights and event updates.
contribution: As a key contributor to the Vita Scholl Web Profile project, my responsibilities as a frontend developer included translating design concepts into a visually appealing and user-friendly interface. I collaborated closely with the design and backend teams to ensure a cohesive and impactful digital presence for Vita School.

title: Citiplan Indonesia
description: Citiplan Indonesia's web profile showcases achievements, services, and commitment to excellence, reflecting company values.
contribution: As a key contributor to the Citiplan Indonesia Web Profile project, my role as a frontend developer involved creating an inviting and user-friendly interface. I collaborated closely with the design and content teams to ensure that the website effectively communicates Citiplan's values, achievements, and services.

title: Artpedia
description: Your go-to for art info! Explore diverse art forms, techniques, and cultural movements. Perfect for enthusiasts, students, and the curious.
